tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE private_equity_firms_portfolio (
  company_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry_sector VARCHAR(100),
  revenue DECIMAL,
  profit DECIMAL,
  investment_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE portfolio_companies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(255),
    revenue DECIMAL,
    employees INT
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES portfolio_companies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    year INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(18, 2),
    expenses DECIMAL(18, 2),
    profit DECIMAL(18, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_performance (
  company_id INT,
  year INT,
  revenue DECIMAL(15, 2),
  expenses DECIMAL(15, 2),
  PRIMARY KEY (company_id, year)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_decisions (
  decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id INT,
  decision_date DATE,
  decision_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount_invested DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE portfolio_companies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    total_investment DECIMAL(18,2),
    year_founded INT
);

CREATE TABLE financial_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    year INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(18,2),
    profit DECIMAL(18,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (performance_id, company_id)
);
